thread.title: BRIEF-Gogo Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.34

title: BRIEF-Gogo Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.34
text:
May 4, 2018 / 11:11 AM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Gogo Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.34 Reuters Staff
May 4 (Reuters) - Gogo Inc: * GOGO ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $232 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $221.5 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.34
* GOGO - FOR FY ENDING DECEMBER 31, CO EXPECTS GROSS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $150 MILLION TO $170 MILLION AND CASH CAPEX OF $110 MILLION TO $130 MILLION
* GOGO SAYS IS WITHDRAWING ITS PREVIOUSLY PROVIDED 2018 GUIDANCE FOR ADJUSTED EBITDA, AIRBORNE CASH CAPEX AS WELL AS FREE CASH FLOW GUIDANCE
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $887.6 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
